contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.BlogPostSummary: Kentico has always excelled at allowing developers to extend the admin site. However, with Xperience by Kentico, there are some notable differences. Let's walk through a step-by-step process for creating custom modules in Xperience by Kentico.
contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.DocumentName: Creating a Custom Module in Xperience by Kentico
